Home.industriesDescription: Current Tech Industries Sdn Bhd, established in 2006, is a high-tech software enterprise based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, with plans to expand to Penang, Sabah, and Sarawak. We specialize in the research, development, production, and sales of technology products. Recognized as a "New Technology Enterprise," we develop projects across various fields. Our talent-oriented management and integrity-based operations attract industry elites, allowing us to integrate advanced technologies and management practices from both domestic and international sources. We provide comprehensive solutions to enhance enterprise management and production capacities, helping businesses remain competitive and achieve stable growth.
Home.technologyDescription: Innovation and technological advancements are key to unlocking a sustainable and prosperous future. Technology has ushered in an era of intelligence, automation, and digitization, driving the transformation and upgrading of industries.

serviceSubTitle_Description.softwareDescription: Empower your business with bespoke software solutions. Our expert developers turn your vision into reality, delivering innovative and dependable software tailored to your unique requirements.
serviceSubTitle_Description.websiteDescription: We develop websites of all sizes using a step-by-step approach. From pre-production planning and crafting the GUI design to backend development, we execute each phase with precision.
serviceSubTitle_Description.mobileAppDescription: We transform our clients’ core ideas into innovative applications for mobile, cloud, and web platforms. We ensure these apps are compatible with major platforms and accessible on a wide range of devices.
serviceSubTitle_Description.managementSystemDescription: The Employee Intelligence Management System (EIMS) is a groundbreaking HR tool that enhances workflow efficiency. It fosters organizational growth and unlocks employee potential through intuitive dashboards, automation, and predictive analytics.
serviceSubTitle_Description.posSystemDescription: Maximize your business efficiency with our robust POS and e-Invoice system. Seamlessly handle sales, inventory, and customer data, ensuring a frictionless checkout experience. Integrated into your workflow, it boosts productivity and customer satisfaction.
serviceSubTitle_Description.support&serviceDescription: Enhance system performance with our expert support. Our team guarantees timely updates and troubleshooting to ensure smooth operations, maintaining your systems at optimal efficiency.

Home.innovativeDescription: Our cutting-edge system will transform your business operations, boosting efficiency, sustainability, and customer experience, thus securing your competitiveness in today's market landscape.

Advantage.advantageVideoDescription: Having a powerful personal system to accomplish your goals is like technology walking hand in hand with you.
Advantage.advantageSelfTitle: The advantage of our technology for Self-Employed
Advantage.advantageSelfDescription: For self-employed individuals like you, regardless of the industry you're in, we firmly believe that your relationship with technology is indispensable. We specialise in tailoring high-quality systems specifically for you, ensuring that your business reaches new heights and making managing your relationships with customers easier and more intimate.

advantageListDescription.websiteDescription: From domain registration to web design, our team ensures the
advantageListDescription.websiteDescriptionMobile: From domain registration to web design, our team ensures the final product matches your vision.

Advantage.advantageEnterpriseTitle: The advantage of our technology for Enterprise
Advantage.advantageEnterpriseDescription: Excellent enterprise management encompasses human resources, administration, finance, as well as employee work progress reports, attendance, and various employee incentive systems. That's why our technology team has developed a meticulous and carefully designed management system tailored for all types of businesses.

Products.productVideoDescription: Development must go through drafting frameworks, understanding details, detailed communication, careful planning, rigorous testing before it can become a finished product.
Products.productTechnologyTitle: High-quality products developed through cutting-edge technology
Products.productTechnologyDescription2: we have meticulously developed software in these fields, and our
Products.productTechnologyDescription3: collaboration with businesses in these sectors is indispensable. We are dedicated to translating the exceptional ideas from our technical engineers into groundbreaking innovations, continually seeking more effective solutions for our customers. This commitment ensures that we stay at the forefront of technology, delivering superior results and driving success for our clients.
Products.mobileProductTechnologyDescription3: in these fields, and our collaboration with businesses in these sectors is indispensable. That's why we translate the most outstanding ideas from our technical engineers into the most innovative creations and find more effective solutions for our customers.

education.educationDescription: A child's learning journey begins in the classroom, using tools that are flexible, user-friendly, prioritise privacy, accessibility, and sustainability. That's why we have developed this product for education, enabling parents, teachers, and school owners to better understand their child's growth in kindergarten. Additionally, we are in the process of developing a series of educational software for primary schools, secondary schools, universities, and tuition centres in the future.

attendance.attendanceDescription: In today's dynamic corporate landscape, businesses grapple with challenges ranging from inconsistent employee efficiency to talent attrition and cost management. Hence, we've meticulously crafted reward mechanisms and recognition programs to help companies effectively tackle these obstacles. Our Motion Capture "MOCAP" not only significantly enhances employee productivity but also boosts morale and elevates output quality. Furthermore, we firmly believe that acknowledging and rewarding employees nurtures a positive organizational culture, where employees feel valued and supported in their roles, thereby aiding in talent retention efforts.

financial.financialDescription: Our IT technical team specialises in developing intelligent back-office solutions for MetaQuote (MT4 / MT5) and cTrader white label and main label operators. We excel in customising web design, client frontend, agent interface, admin backend, and commission rebate systems according to the requirements of white label providers and main label operators. Our Smart Dash are designed to perfectly display the data clients want to see, and we prioritise providing the most robust security for client funds and personal information.

management.managementDescription: We fully understand that as a highly skilled and renowned trader, managing numerous investors and substantial funds requires not only delivering substantial and objective investment returns but also maintaining strict risk management in investments. Therefore, traders inevitably require a sophisticated and intelligent financial trading fund management system. Our proficient IT team is fully capable of undertaking the development of such a system. We have not only added personalised design to the dashboard but also incorporated simple and easy-to-operate modes, ensuring that investors and traders need not worry about encountering operational difficulties due to lack of understanding.

labelSolutions.labelSolutionsDescription: Not only do we seamlessly integrate the trading platform interface with our intelligent backend, but we also offer Metaquote (MT5) and cTrader white label and main label solutions. The advantage of our one-stop service ensures that you are relieved of many unnecessary hassles and allows you to accelerate the launch of operations, avoiding missing the absolute best timing for operations.

metaEditor.metaEditorDescription: This is undoubtedly great news for traders, as the widespread use of AI is becoming an inevitable trend. Many investment firms and top traders have begun to adopt AI automated trading systems, and we specialise in the development of such intelligent trading systems. We can fully transform the mindset and strategies of top traders into AI trading systems and apply them to trading on MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, and cTrader trading platforms.

cryptoWallet.cryptoWalletDescription: Many multinational companies conduct business through websites, and even investment firms operate beyond their own countries. Thus, having a comprehensive and highly secure payment system is essential. The TTPAY payment system not only addresses the complexities of cross-border transactions but also significantly enhances security for merchants. Furthermore, applying for a TTPAY payment system account is free and straightforward, providing businesses with an efficient and reliable solution for their payment needs.

OwnSite.ownsiteDescription1: Let us help you craft an exceptional website for yourself.
OwnSite.ownsiteSubDescription: Whether you are a business or an individual, our company is dedicated to deeply understanding your needs and passionately crafting an exceptional one-stop website system that exceeds your expectations, covering everything from front-end to back-end.
OwnSite.ownsiteDescription2: Whether you aim to transition from traditional business to modern digital platforms or you're already an established enterprise, we offer top-notch conceptual templates to prepare you for transformative growth and quality enhancement. You don’t need to worry about where to start, because our meticulous approach begins with a deep understanding of your unique needs.

ownsiteTheme.e-Commerce_Description: e-Commerce offers unparalleled convenience, enabling seamless transactions, expansive product selections, and effortless comparison shopping, ultimately empowering consumers with accessibility and efficiency in their purchasing experience.
ownsiteTheme.Commercial_Description: A commercial web page offers many benefits, such as increased customer accessibility, 24/7 availability, and dynamic product showcasing. It provides valuable analytics, enhances brand visibility, and streamlines purchasing, driving sales and fostering customer loyalty.
ownsiteTheme.Admin_Description: Creating your own admin dashboard offers centralized control, real-time data monitoring, and customized reporting. It enhances decision-making, streamlines workflow management, and improves security with tailored access controls, empowering businesses to operate more effectively and respond quickly to changes.
ownsiteTheme.Investment_Description: Creating your own investment website provides enhanced control over strategies, real-time portfolio tracking, and personalized insights. It integrates advanced analytics, streamlines user experiences, and offers tailored educational resources. This fosters better client engagement, trust, and informed investment decisions, driving financial growth.
ownsiteTheme.Digital_Description: Creating a Fintech website with Crypto, Blockchain, NFT or Gaming Board features enables real-time transactions, secure asset management, and new revenue streams. It offers advanced analytics, personalized experiences, and boosts security and transparency, fostering trust in digital finance.

Price.price_SubTitle: The most important thing is your values, not the price.
Price.price_Description: In the journey of business development, it's essential to consider more than just funding. However, funding is not the main focus. The key lies in the values you set for your business, how you showcase your business's appeal, and how you allow customers to assess your value. Whether you're a newcomer establishing a business or a well-known company in the market, here you can find the tools and answers you need.

PrivacyPolicyModal.name: PRIVACY POLICY
PrivacyPolicyModal.thankYou: Thank you for visiting our website.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weValueYour: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
PrivacyPolicyModal.thePrivacyPolicy: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you use our services.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weValueYourIpad: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you use our services.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weMayCollect: We may collect personal data such as your name, email address, and contact information,
PrivacyPolicyModal.weMayCollectIpad: We may collect personal data such as your name, email address, and contact information, typically when you register for an account, subscribe to our services, or fill out forms.
PrivacyPolicyModal.typicallyWhen: typically when you register for an account, subscribe to our services, or fill out forms.
PrivacyPolicyModal.collectNonPersonally: We may collect non-personally identifiable information, including browser type, device information,
PrivacyPolicyModal.ipAddress: IP address, date and time of access, to improve our website and services.
PrivacyPolicyModal.ifOurService: If our services involve financial transactions, we collect relevant payment information,
PrivacyPolicyModal.whichIs: which is processed securely through encryption.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weUseYou: We use your information to provide and maintain our services, including account management and transaction
PrivacyPolicyModal.support: support, to improve our products, and to send you notifications about products and services you may be
PrivacyPolicyModal.interestedIn: interested in. We ensure to obtain your consent before using your data, as required under the PDPA.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weProvide: We provide an option to unsubscribe from marketing communications and explain how users can exercise their
PrivacyPolicyModal.pdpaRight: PDPA rights, including access, correction, and deletion of their personal data.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weDoNotSell: We do not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose your personal data to third parties, except under the following
PrivacyPolicyModal.weMayShare: We may share information with third-party vendors who assist us in providing services
PrivacyPolicyModal.theseVendors: These vendors are obligated to protect your privacy and only have access to data necessary for their functions.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weMayDisclose: We may disclose information as required by Malaysian law or regulations, including sharing with regulatory
PrivacyPolicyModal.weTakeReasonable: We take reasonable technical and organisational measures to prevent unauthorised access, disclosure,
PrivacyPolicyModal.alteration: alteration, or destruction of your personal data. Although we strive to use industry-standard measures, no system
PrivacyPolicyModal.canGuarantee: can guarantee absolute security. Users are advised to consider potential security risks when transmitting data.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weRetain: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.
PrivacyPolicyModal.onceTheData: Once the data is no longer needed, we will either delete it or anonymise it.
PrivacyPolicyModal.incompliance: In compliance with the PDPA, you have the right to view, correct, and delete your personal data. Please contact us
PrivacyPolicyModal.usingTheInfo: using the information provided below to exercise these rights.
PrivacyPolicyModal.weMayUpdate: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you if
PrivacyPolicyModal.necessary: necessary. We recommend reviewing this policy regularly to stay informed.

attendenceDescription: In today’s fast-paced world, businesses face challenges like efficiency, retention, and cost control. Our Motion Capture (MOCAP) system tackles these by boosting productivity, morale, and work quality, fostering a positive culture that enhances retention.
attendenceDescriptionMobile: In today’s fast-paced world, businesses face challenges like efficiency, retention, and cost control. Our Motion Capture (MOCAP) system tackles these by boosting productivity, morale, and work quality, fostering a positive culture that enhances retention.
attendenceSummary: Motion Capture (MOCAP) is an employee management system that boosts productivity and satisfaction. With smart dashboards for managing attendance, tasks, and rewards, it offers flexible hours, performance charts, and birthday perks. For employers, MOCAP provides detailed data, project progress, and task tracking, optimising workforce management and reducing turnover, creating a motivating and efficient work environment.
